languages.text:
You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Click [RMB] on an event or an action to learn more about it.
languages.original_text:
Чтобы понять, что именно произошло в бою, посмотрите записи сражения. Все действия, совершенные вашим персонажем, его спутникам и врагами, фиксируются в логе боя в правом нижнем углу экрана.
Чтобы узнать больше о событии или действии, кликните по нему [ПКМ].

traits.locale_text:
You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Click [RMB] on an event or an action to learn more about it.

You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Click [RMB] on an event or an action to learn more about it.

You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Click [RMB] on an event or an action to learn more about it.

You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Click [RMB] on an event or an action to learn more about it.

You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Click [RMB] on an event or an action to learn more about it.

languages.text:
Чтобы понять, что именно произошло в бою, посмотрите записи сражения. Все действия, совершенные вашим персонажем, его спутникам и врагами, фиксируются в логе боя в правом нижнем углу экрана.
Чтобы узнать больше о событии или действии, кликните по нему [ПКМ].

您可以查看战斗日志，更好地了解战斗过程。您的角色、同伴与敌人的所有行动，都会记录在屏幕右下角的战斗日志中。
点击鼠标右键，即可了解事件或动作的详细信息。
languages.original_text:
You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Click [RMB] on an event or an action to learn more about it.

traits.locale_text:
您可以查看战斗日志，更好地了解战斗过程。您的角色、同伴与敌人的所有行动，都会记录在屏幕右下角的战斗日志中。
点击鼠标右键，即可了解事件或动作的详细信息。

languages.text:
戦闘ログを確認することで、戦闘中に起きたことをより深く理解することができる。プレイヤーが使うキャラクター、仲間、敵が行ったアクションはすべて、画面右下の戦闘ログに記録される。
イベントまたはアクションの [RMB] をクリックすると詳細を確認できる。
languages.original_text:
You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Click [RMB] on an event or an action to learn more about it.

traits.locale_text:
戦闘ログを確認すると、戦闘で何が起こったのかをより深く理解することができる。プレイヤーが使うキャラクター、仲間、敵が行ったアクションはすべて、画面右下の戦闘ログに記録される。
イベントまたはアクションの [RMB] をクリックすると詳細を確認できる。

languages.text:
Échale un vistazo al registro de combate para comprender mejor lo que ocurre en el campo de batalla. Todas las acciones que realicen tu personaje, sus compañeros y los enemigos quedan plasmadas en el registro que está en la parte inferior derecha de la pantalla.
Pulsa el [botón derecho del ratón] sobre un evento o acción para obtener más información al respecto.
languages.original_text:
You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Click [RMB] on an event or an action to learn more about it.

traits.locale_text:
Échale un vistazo al registro de combate para comprender mejor lo que ocurre en el campo de batalla. Todas las acciones que realicen tu personaje, sus compañeros y los enemigos quedan plasmadas en el registro que está en la parte inferior derecha de la pantalla.
Pulsa el [botón derecho del ratón] sobre un evento o acción para obtener más información al respecto.

languages.text:
Du kannst dir ein besseres Bild von den Geschehnissen in einem Kampf machen, indem du dir das Kampflog ansiehst. Alle Aktionen deines Charakters, seiner Begleiter und Gegner werden im Kampflog in der unteren rechten Ecke des Bildschirms aufgelistet.
Halte [RMB] gedrückt, um mehr über Ereignisse oder Aktionen zu erfahren.
languages.original_text:
You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Click [RMB] on an event or an action to learn more about it.

traits.locale_text:
Du kannst dir ein besseres Bild davon machen, was im Kampf passiert ist, indem du dir das Kampflog ansiehst. Alle Aktionen deines Charakters, seiner Begleiter und Gegner werden im Kampflog in der unteren rechten Ecke des Bildschirms aufgelistet.
Halte die [RMB] gedrückt, um mehr über ein Ereignis oder eine Aktion zu erfahren.

languages.text:
Pour mieux comprendre ce qui s'est passé lors du combat, consultez le journal de combat. Toutes les actions effectuées par votre personnage, ses compagnons et ses ennemis sont consignées dans le journal de combat situé dans le coin inférieur droit de l'écran.
Cliquez avec le [BDS] sur un événement ou une action pour en savoir plus.
languages.original_text:
You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Click [RMB] on an event or an action to learn more about it.

traits.locale_text:
Pour mieux comprendre ce qui s'est passé lors du combat, consultez le journal de combat. Toutes les actions effectuées par votre personnage, ses compagnons et ses ennemis sont consignées dans le journal de combat situé dans le coin inférieur droit de l'écran.
Cliquez avec le [BDS] sur un événement ou une action pour en savoir plus.

languages.text:
Çatışma kayıtlarına göz atarak çatışmada neler cereyan ettiğini daha iyi anlayabilirsin. Karakter, onun yoldaşları ve düşmanlar tarafından gerçekleştirilen tüm eylemler, ekranın sağ alt köşesindeki çatışma kayıtlarına kaydedilir.
Bir olay veya eylem hakkında daha fazla bilgi edinmek için üstüne sağ fare tuşuyla tıkla.
languages.original_text:
You can gain a better understanding of what transpired in combat by checking the combat log. All actions performed by your character, their companions, and enemies are recorded in the combat log in the bottom right corner of the screen.
Click [RMB] on an event or an action to learn more about it.
